item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 21, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Dividing unsigned 8-bit numbers (61 points | 35 comments)
2. Query Apple's FindMy network with Python (264 points | 109 comments)
3. Magical Thinking: Edward Bellamy's Looking Backward (2011) (4 points | discuss)
4. Show HN: Eonfall – A new third-person co-op action game built for the web (101 points | 67 comments)

6. Ideas from "A Philosophy of Software Design" (17 points | 3 comments)

9. City Roads: A tool to draw all roads in a city at once (30 points | 7 comments)
10. Grammarly acquires Coda (44 points | 17 comments)
11. Introducing S2 (183 points | 95 comments)

14. Show HN: Demo of my web game about social persuasion (12 points | 7 comments)
15. Singlefile: A web extension to save a complete web page into a single HTML file (52 points | 27 comments)
16. Escaping Google's manual reputation penalty and resuming business as usual (140 points | 31 comments)
17. US judge finds NSO Group liable for hacking journalists via WhatsApp (383 points | 95 comments)

19. Turing Machines (43 points | 6 comments)
20. Wuppertal's suspended monorail proved its doubters wrong [video] (18 points | 3 comments)
21. More than 140 Kenya Facebook moderators sue after diagnoses of PTSD (97 points | 52 comments)
22. Talking over a wall changed my direction as a programmer (22 points | 4 comments)
23. The One Hundred Pages Strategy (24 points | 2 comments)

25. Fixing C Strings (19 points | 17 comments)
26. How the Samuel Smith beer baron built Britain's strangest pub chain (47 points | 20 comments)
27. Mass psychogenic illness and the social network (2012) (18 points | 9 comments)
28. Is stuff online worth saving? (99 points | 111 comments)
29. The Engineering of Wildlife Crossings (28 points | 2 comments)
30. Researchers discover new ocean predator in the Atacama Trench (58 points | 20 comments)
